title: E-Commerce Store
description: A full-stack e-commerce app built with react, express, mongoose and node.js. State management on the front end is handled with redux toolkit while routing is handled by react-router-dom

title: Store API
description: An API that serves the e-commerce app at https://peculiar-store.vercel.app/. It includes user authentication, CRUD operations & test payment with paystack.

title: Tribute Page
description: A tribute page dedicated to Marie Curie

title: Pomodoro Timer
description: A pomodoro clock

title: Random Quotes Generator
description: An app that shows random quotes

title: Markdown Previewer
description: A markdown previewer

title: Javascript Calculator
description: A javascript calculator built with React and Bootstrap

title: Drum Machine
description: A drum machine

title: Anonymous Message Board API
description: An API that serves an anonymous message board

title: Space Tourism
description: This is a solution to the REST Countries API with color theme switcher challenge on Frontend Mentor, (https://www.frontendmentor.io/challenges/space-tourism-multipage-website-gRWj1URZ3/).

title: Countries Info App
description: This is a solution to the REST Countries API with color theme switcher challenge on Frontend Mentor, (https://www.frontendmentor.io/challenges/rest-countries-api-with-color-theme-switcher-5cacc469fec04111f7b848ca).

title: Stock Price Checker API
description: An API that checks the price of popular stocks and compares the prices of 2 stocks

title: Personal Library API
description: An API that tracks book titles in a personal library and comments associated with the books

title: Issue Tracker API
description: A REST API that keeps tracks of issues in a project.

title: Header Parser
description: A full stack app that parses the request header of the user and returns their IP address, language and user agent

title: Exercise Tracker
description: A simple full stack app that keeps tracks of exercise logs of different users

title: URL Shortener
description: A full stack app that shortens URLs.

title: File Metadata
description: A simple full stack app that accepts images, uploads to cloudinary and returns its metadata

title: Timestamp App
description: A simple full stack app that parses unix dates and YYYY-MM-DD formatted dates, and returns utc dates.

title: Orbiter App
description: A redesign of https://www.getorbiter.com/ using HTML5, CSS3 and Vanilla JS

title: Metric-Imperial Converter
description: A simple Full-Stack app that converts metric units to imperial units and vice versa.
